section1_description: The definitive MakerDAO information source. Trying to understand how MakerDAO works? Or maybe you're just trying to find ways to contribute. We're here to help you get started with MakerDAO!
section2_want_to_contribute: MakerDAO offers many ways to start contributing, and Maker Academy prepares you for them all!
section2_learn_about_maker: Maker Academy offers the complete Maker journey: learn about Maker, create web3 content, and become onboarded as a MakerDAO contributor.  Watch Intro Video
section2_tailored_programs: Tailored programs to make you an expert on any aspect of web3, giving you the best chance to succeed at MakerDAO
